mapper.sql: I.id as image_id, I.applicationid as image_applicationid, I.imagekey as image_key, I.width as image_width, I.height as image_height, I.filesize as image_filesize, I.filepath as image_filepath, I.imagetypeid as image_imagetype, I.created as image_datecreated, I.updated as image_dateupdated
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Image ( applicationid, imagekey, width, height, filesize, filepath, imagetypeid, created ) VALUES ( #{applicationId}, #{key}, #{dimensions.width}, #{dimensions.height}, #{fileSize}, #{filePath}, #{imageType.id}, GETDATE() )
mapper.update: UPDATE Image SET width = #{dimensions.width}, height = #{dimensions.height}, filesize = #{fileSize}, filepath = #{filePath}, imagetypeid = #{imageType.id}, updated = GETDATE() WHERE imagekey = #{key} AND applicationid = #{applicationId}
